CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 21,22 Polymers based on DTS normally have high hole mobility and strong light absorption in the visible region of the solar spectrum and hence the improvement in photovoltaic performance , which reached 5.1% .

Let's think step by step.

1. DTS: This is a type of polymer, so "DTS" can be identified as a Material Name entity.
2. Polymers based on DTS: This refers to polymers that are made from or contain DTS as a component, so "polymers based on DTS" can also be identified as a Material Name entity.

Therefore, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "DTS" and "polymers based on DTS".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. DTS
2. Polymers based on DTS

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTS |
| Polymers based on DTS |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 21,22 Polymers based on DTS normally have high hole mobility and strong light absorption in the visible region of the solar spectrum and hence the improvement in photovoltaic performance , which reached 5.1% .

Let's think step by step.

1. "21,22 Polymers based on DTS" - This refers to a specific type of polymers, where DTS is a material or property that these polymers are based on.
2. "high hole mobility" - This is a property or characteristic of the polymers.
3. "strong light absorption in the visible region of the solar spectrum" - This is another property or characteristic of the polymers.
4. "improvement in photovoltaic performance" - This is a measure of the effectiveness of the polymers in converting solar energy into electricity.
5. "5.1%" - This is a specific value or number representing the improvement in photovoltaic performance.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. "5.1%" - This is the only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a value of a material property, specifically the improvement in photovoltaic performance.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| improvement in photovoltaic performance: 5.1% |
